member.summary: The Blazor Rich Text Editor is a feature-rich WYSIWYG HTML editor and WYSIWYG Markdown editor. The Rich Text Editor is widely used to create blogs, forum posts, notes sections, support tickets (incidents), comment sections, messaging applications, and more.

member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates the allows to edit and formatting the HTML or Markdown content.
